tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_component_funding_organization_name; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_component_funding_organization_name AS SELECT f.activity_id AS amp_activity_id, org.name AS org_name, f.rep_organization_id AS org_id FROM amp_activity_components aac JOIN amp_component_funding f ON (f.activity_id = aac.amp_activity_id) AND (f.amp_component_id = aac.amp_component_id) JOIN amp_components c ON (f.amp_component_id = c.amp_component_id) JOIN amp_activity activ ON activ.amp_activity_id = aac.amp_activity_id JOIN amp_organisation org ON org.amp_org_id = f.rep_organization_id;
